content: SPX Turbo A Diamond grinding cup wheel Ultimate diamond cup wheel for highly efficient and scratch-free grinding of concrete, screed and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate grinding efficiency – specially shaped segments and larger, high-quality abrasive diamonds help you to remove more material per battery charge Scratch-free finish – premium, extra-fine diamonds make it easier to create a smooth final surface Improved dust extraction – larger ventilation holes help to prevent dust clogging the abrasive surface, prolonging the lifespan of every cup wheel Longer-lasting – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every Hilti diamond cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Grinding concrete walls and ceilings to remove formwork marks Finishing grinding of concrete and natural stone Grinding chamfers into concrete edges ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 Base material: Concrete, Abrasive concrete, Natural stone, Screed Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 | Base material | Concrete, Abrasive concrete, Natural stone, Screed | Product Class | Ultimate | Diameter | 5 in | Arbor size | 22.225 mm | Segment height | 5.3 mm ### ITEMS- 2357233 - Diamond Cup DGH 130 5 SPX Turbo A - Package Size 1 pc - 2357234 - Diamond Cup DGH 130 5 SPX Turbo A - Package Size 6 pc
